channel.title: History of Indian and Africana Philosophy
channel.description: Peter Adamson teams up with Jonardon Ganeri and Chike Jeffers to represent the philosophical traditions of India, Africa and the African diaspora. Website: www.historyofphilosophy.net.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The History of Philosophy podcast expands to cover the philosophical riches Indian and Africana culture.
channel.itunes:summary: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, and Chike Jeffers present the philosophical traditions of India, Africa, and the African Diaspora. Further reading and info at www.historyofphilosophy.net.
channel.itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
